name: SKAction
desc: An object that is run by a node to change its structure or content.

items.name: var duration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The duration required to complete an action.

items.name: var timingMode: SKActionTimingMode
items.desc: A setting that controls the speed curve of an animation.

items.name: enum SKActionTimingMode
items.desc: The modes that an action can use to adjust the apparent timing of the action.

items.name: var timingFunction: SKActionTimingFunction
items.desc: A block used to customize the timing function.

items.name: typealias SKActionTimingFunction
items.desc: The signature for the custom timing block.

items.name: var speed: CGFloat
items.desc: A speed factor that modifies how fast an action runs.
